title: New champions for my pool
body: I'm looking for a champion that does not have to roam, watch out for ganks or anything. Basically a braindead champion like Nasus (dont want a war about how he is not braindead).

replies.body: Heimerdinger aint need wards just saying, he can survive a 4v1 easy provided he has 3 turrets out.
Teemo, Riven, Fizz, Darius, Rengar, LeBlanc, Master Yi, Malhpite, Nasus, Renekton and any toplane champion.

> [{quoted}](name=Bipolar,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=mWuQRXl2,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-08-02T04:52:19.321+0000)
>
> Teemo, Riven, Fizz, Darius, Rengar, LeBlanc, Master Yi, Malhpite, Nasus, Renekton and any toplane champion.

"does not have to roam", where does Rengar fit in that category? He was made for roaming

> [{quoted}](name=Chicken4dinner,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=mWuQRXl2,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-08-02T08:14:34.694+0000)
>
> "does not have to roam", where does Rengar fit in that category? He was made for roaming

I didn't read the thread, I admit.
Every champion is going to have to worried about getting ganked! However you seemed to be looking for a split-pushing champion. ^_^

wtf do you mean does not have to roam. you never have to roam, but if you dont want to to help your team then you're a lazy fuckin dick. who knew walking in a computer game was just as hard as irl. dont wanna watch out for ganks? then buy wards and you'll see ganks coming from ages away, or play bots, or aram
Ryze, Ezreal, Karthus. More the first two.
